sentences.sContent: The course syllabus consisted mainly of novels by African-American authors, male and female.
sentences.sCn: 该课程的教学大纲主要包括了非裔美国男女作家的小说。

remMethod.val: syl(一起) + lab(拿) + us → 把(不同的课程)拿到一起 → 教学大纲

trans.tranCn: 教学大纲， 课程提纲
trans.tranOther: a plan that states exactly what students at a school or college should learn in a particular subject
